'''Sparkling Berry Juice''' is a [[food]] item. It can be purchased from [[Charles]] at [[Angel's Share]] for 1,500 [[Mora]] (max 2 per day).

Two Sparkling Berry Juice could be purchased from [[Georg]] per day during the [[Of Ballads and Brews]] Event.

Sparkling Berry Juice revives and restores '''15'''% of Max HP, then restores an additional '''550''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
